name: Put a Flag on It!
description:
How does one conquer a planet with ease? Why, just....

Put a Flag on It! Exploration-based Space Golf! Try to land your probe on every planet in the galaxy!
  • [Shift+Click] Fire Probe
  • [Ctrl+Shift+Click] Fire Probe with more power
  • [Scroll] or [Z / X] to zoom
  • [L] to toggle logs
  • [K] to hide UI text 
NOTE: If you have performance issues, try switching from chrome to firefox, or from firefox to chrome, and you might see a difference! 

Made in 7 days for haxeJam 2021
